name: Sugarush! (Randomaniac)
description:
SUGARUSH! THIS GAME HAS FLASHING LIGHTS

and a tad bit of blood

Sweet Jolly! It's raining candy outside!

Can you avoid eating to much of that sweet silly saliva inducing sweets? Or will you faint and break your spine?

Press the spacebar to jump therefore avoid the candies! Credits:

Menu music and death music by Scratch Sound Library

Other music made by SergeQuadrado on pixabay

this is my first game i released on itch.io and made with scratch, don't expect it to be great
